comment.author: 23072476@N02
comment._content: I love this shot! The ones where people don't know they're being photographed are the best. Seeing people acting natural reminds you that people have always been the same.

comment.author: 8599848@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called skint...getting by creatively and gracefully, and we'd love to have this added to the group! I need that gaint flag cover for my portable garage!

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: May 25, 1911. Two more photographs from this occasion, the annual lawn party of the Army Relief Society (which raised funds for the care of widows and orphans of officers and enlisted men of the Regular Army): www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163471986/in/p... www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2163471766/in/p...
